text: Yi manisaharu mukhale ta bhandachan ki (tapa'iko) ajnakari haum, tara tapa'ibata alaga bha'era ga'isakepachi tiniharumadhye eka samuhale ratima tapa'iko kurako virodhama sarasallaha gardachan. Ra allahale uniharuko ratika kuraharu lekhirakheko cha. Tasartha yiniharuko vasta nagarnus ra allahamathi bharosa garnus ra allaha nai sabai kama pura garna saksama cha
